text: Tadeusz Szelachowski (7 April 1932 - 9 September 2020) was a Polish physician and politician. He was born in Sielachowskie, Poland. From 1981 to 1985, he was Minister of Health. Between 1985 to 1989, he was a member of Sejm. Szelachowski died on 9 September 2020 in Warsaw, aged 88.Pożegnaliśmy Śp. Tadeusza Szelachowskiego, absolwenta I rocznika AMB, byłego Ministra Zdrowia ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish politicians
title: Tadeusz Szelachowski
